source_caption_data.pre_caption: A medium close-up shot centers on a man and a woman slow-dancing in the middle ground. The camera initially frames the scene from behind the man, with the woman visible over his shoulder. As the couple sways and turns, the camera orbits with them, maintaining their central position while shifting the viewing angle to reveal their profiles and faces at different moments. In the background, out-of-focus red and green lights are positioned in the top right and top left of the frame. Above the couple in the top-center, glittery star ornaments hang in the middle ground, just behind them. Dark, vertically striped walls are occasionally visible in the background on the left. The camera remains at the subjects' level throughout the shot.
